articles.author: euronews.com
articles.title: 'AI scientist' created to run its own experiments. What will this mean for scientific discoveries?
articles.description: Researchers at Sakana.AI, a Tokyo-based company, have worked on developing a large language model (LLM) designed specifically for scientific research.
articles.content:
Researchers at Sakana.AI, a Tokyo-based company, have worked on developing a large language model (LLM) designed specifically for scientific research.
This story appeared on euronews.com, 2024-09-07.
